about_the_game:
Mission Mars is an action FPS inspired by the shooters of the 1990s.
The game features an intense single player experience set on Mars in the 22nd century.
You are part of a crew on a mission to Mars. The plan is to land on Mars for exploration and colonization. The flight and landing were successful. During construction of a base something went wrong. There was an explosion, the base is destroyed. You are the only one who survived. A spacecraft used in the mission is undamaged. The goal is to get to the spacecraft and return to Earth. The path to the spacecraft leads through seven maps situated on the Mars surface and underground structures. Demo contains only first map.

content_descriptors.notes: Game shows violence of a slightly more graphic nature towards fantasy characters and non-realistic violence towards human-like characters.
